page.title: 14TY UCHA CARAVANS,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: {Ty Ucha}caravan site is situated just on the outskirts of Llangollen, it is a small and friendly site and has beautiful surroundings.Apart from being a caravan site, Ty Ucha is a {farm}which consists of{350 sheep}and they cultivate grass for{hay}and {silage.}The site is just 10 years old and can hold a maximum of{30 caravans when open,which is from{May {to September.}The facilities provided are toilets,showers,fresh water, electric points also a recreation room.It is also possible to buy groceries,bread and milk.However, there are no laundry facilities or any suitable place for young children to play safely.The people that visit the site come from all over the country and many come from abroad.In the summer there are 4 to 5{Caravan Club rallies held at Ty Ucha.
